/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/:
The image captures a bustling construction site in the heart of Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, providing a ground-level view of the ongoing development. The construction site is cordoned off by a blue fence, ensuring the safety of passersby while allowing visibility of the ongoing work. 

Power lines stretch across the scene, a common sight in urban landscapes, hinting at the city's infrastructure. In the distance, tall buildings under construction rise against the backdrop of a clear blue sky, a testament to the city's rapid urbanization. The image is bathed in the bright sunlight of the day, casting shadows that add depth to the scene.
